entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 06:48 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.2°C

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow early this morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
